docs.lead_paragraph: Pfizer, one of the three companies behind the drug, said it did not improve either cognition or daily functioning compared to a placebo.

headline.seo: Alzheimer’s Drug Fails Its First Big Clinical Trial
headline.main: Alzheimer’s Drug Fails Its First Big Clinical Trial
headline.print_headline: Alzheimer’s Drug Fails First Big Clinical Trial

docs.abstract: Pfizer announces that the closely watched experimental Alzheimer's disease treatment bapineuzumab proved ineffective in its first large clinical trial; drug was not found to improve cognition or daily functioning of patients compared to a placebo in the Phase 3 trial; disappointing results deal a blow to the field, to a theory about the cause of the disease and to the three companies behind the drug.
docs.snippet: Pfizer, one of the three companies behind the drug, said it did not improve either cognition or daily functioning compared to a placebo.
